aboutPowers.title: Laser light show
aboutPowers.about: A powerful energy attack that stuns enemies

aboutPowers.title: Improve healthcare
aboutPowers.about: Replenishes the health of all other players

aboutPowers.title: Law and order
aboutPowers.about: Ability to bail characters out of jail

aboutPowers.title: Garden magic

aboutPowers.title: Finance expert
aboutPowers.about: Money pops out of trees when you run into them

aboutPowers.title: Boyfriend bonus
aboutPowers.about: Gains +20% XP when in close proximity to Amanda
